The Only Startup in CNews Top AI Solutions Market Players List

Sep 11, 2025

WaiWai was included in the CNews Analytics review "Largest Players in the Russian AI Solutions Market 2024".

The ranking includes 37 names - among them traditional companies, digital agencies, and integrators, but we are the only young startup.

Our core values:

- Metrics - when implementing AI, we apply both classic business metrics and innovative ones - for example, LLM Ops measurements. This way we automatically check all AI-related functionality using another AI.

- One man army: careful resource management, quick decisions, persistence. The "weapon" of such an army is code, neural networks, algorithms. One engineer with a laptop can create products that used to require hundreds of specialists.

- Staying on the cutting edge of technological trends. To achieve this, we participate in the world's largest hackathons and win them.

Thanks to this, we receive industry awards and stand alongside industry giants.

The full CNews ranking can be found at: https://www.cnews.ru/reviews/tehnologii_iskusstvennogo_intellekta
